amendment.description: Amendment sought to cap the per passenger subsidy for essential air service at $250 in lieu of the $500 level in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to provide essential air service to communities that require a rate of subsidy per passenger in excess of $250 instead of the $500 level in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 224 (Roll no. 421).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 224 (Roll no. 421).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Grayson.
